posts.post_content: This is a good card. At pre-release, he wasn't as good as I imagined he'd be. In limited we have a great deal of artifact creatures that control him easily. Maybe I needed some nicer equipment for him. I can see this guy being better in constructed where artifact blockers are less commonplace and coloured removal spells are more important.

Posted By: Keiya (9/30/2010 9:14:09 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This artifact soldier is really good. I run four of them in my new type 2 deck and often equip him with equipments such as Basilisk Collar, Sword of Vengeance or even Bladed Pinions to stop flying creatures if needed. Combined with Steel Overseer and/or Voltaic Key, this guy is a very good attacker and defender.
posts.html:

Combined with Steel Overseer and/or Voltaic Key, this guy is a very good attacker and defender.
